meshIneBits

Class Pattern

  • java.lang.Object
    • meshIneBits.Pattern
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Pattern
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    Build by a PatternTemplate. Contains a set of Bit2D.

      • moveBit

        public Vector2 moveBit(Vector2 key,
                       Vector2 direction,
                       double offsetValue)
        Move the chosen bit in the wanted direction. Note: not exactly "moving", but rather "removing" then "adding" new one
        Parameters:
        key - the key of the bit we want to move
        direction - in the local coordinate system of the bit
        offsetValue - the distance of displacement
        Returns:
        the key of the newly added bit
